code:
stateDiagram-v2
    %% L++ State Diagram: L++ Coverage Analyzer
    [Education_ContentCDN] --> idle
    idle --> loaded : LOAD [Education_ClassroomService]
    loaded --> loaded : LOAD
    tracking --> loaded : LOAD
    analyzing --> loaded : LOAD
    reporting --> loaded : LOAD
    loaded --> tracking : START [Education_ContentCDN]
    tracking --> tracking : STATE
    tracking --> tracking : TRANSITION
    tracking --> tracking : GATE
    tracking --> tracking : ACTION
    tracking --> tracking : EVENT
    loaded --> tracking : IMPORT [Education_ClassroomService]
    tracking --> tracking : IMPORT [Education_ContentCDN]
    tracking --> analyzing : ANALYZE [Education_ContentCDN]
    loaded --> analyzing : ANALYZE [Education_ClassroomService]
    analyzing --> reporting : SUMMARY [Education_ContentCDN]
    analyzing --> reporting : DETAILED [Education_StudentDB]
    analyzing --> reporting : GAP [Education_LMS_Portal]
    analyzing --> reporting : ALL_REPORTS [Education_StudentDB]
    reporting --> reporting : EXPORT_HTML [Education_ClassroomService]
    analyzing --> reporting : EXPORT_HTML [Education_ContentCDN]
    reporting --> reporting : EXPORT_JSON [Education_ClassroomService]
    analyzing --> reporting : EXPORT_JSON [Education_GradeSync]
    reporting --> reporting : SUMMARY [Education_StudentDB]
    reporting --> reporting : DETAILED [Education_GradeSync]
    reporting --> reporting : GAP [Education_GradeSync]
    tracking --> loaded : RESET
    analyzing --> loaded : RESET
    reporting --> loaded : RESET
    analyzing --> tracking : BACK
    reporting --> analyzing : BACK
    loaded --> idle : UNLOAD
    tracking --> idle : UNLOAD
    analyzing --> idle : UNLOAD
    reporting --> idle : UNLOAD

extra.repo_description: L++ is not a programming language. It is a language-agnostic Logic Frame designed to execute business processes defined in purely symbolic, declarative blueprints.
